summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6109 for the improvement of HOOKER STREET from 40th Avenue West to 42nd Avenue West; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84366, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, established a Local Improvement Fund.
